short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome browser extension for monitoring GED Flash quiz activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It detects the following test activity on the GED: date, start and end , duration, total questions and correct questions, subject, and subject area. The test activity is sent to a monitoring platform on which the user has previously registered.
